title: Stemplot Constructor
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating how data values decompose into stems and leaves to build a stemplot visualization. Features step-through animation, sample datasets, and adjustable animation speed.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Data Visualization
Stemplot
Stem-and-Leaf Plot
Quantitative Data Display
learningObjective: Students will interpret how data values decompose into stems and leaves
prerequisites: Understanding of place value (tens and ones)

inputBox.description: Enter a two-digit number (0-99) to add to the stemplot

addValue.description: Add the entered value to the pending queue and begin decomposition animation

stepThrough.description: Process one value at a time from the sample dataset queue

autoBuild.description: Automatically animate the entire sample dataset construction

clear.description: Reset the stemplot and clear all data

datasetDropdown.description: Select from sample datasets: Quiz Scores, Ages, or Heights

speedSlider.description: Adjust animation speed for decomposition and placement
